description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一个民主党派，其前身是华侨社团“美洲洪门致公堂”。党员主要来自归国华侨、侨眷和与海外有联系的代表性人士。
description.en: A democratic party in the People's Republic of China, its predecessor was the overseas Chinese organization "Hongmen Chee Kung Tong in the Americas". Its members mainly come from returned overseas Chinese, their relatives, and representative figures with overseas connections.

description.zh-cn: 中国致公党的创始人之一，被推举为首任总理。
description.en: One of the founders of the China Zhi Gong Party, he was elected as its first Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中国致公党的创始人之一，被推举为首任副总理。
description.en: One of the founders of the China Zhi Gong Party, he was elected as its first Vice Premier.

description.zh-cn: 海外华侨社团，中国致公党的前身。
description.en: An overseas Chinese society, the predecessor of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国致公党现任（第16届）中央委员会主席。
description.en: The current (16th) Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国致公党第3届中央委员会主席，同时参与组建中国国民党革命委员会。
description.en: Served as the Chairman of the 3rd Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party, and also participated in the formation of the Revolutionary Committee of the Chinese Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国致公党第4至6届中央委员会主席。在反右运动中被划为右派，后在文革期间被迫害致死。
description.en: Served as the Chairman of the 4th to 6th Central Committees of the China Zhi Gong Party. He was labeled a rightist during the Anti-Rightist Campaign and was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国致公党第7、8届中央委员会主席。
description.en: Served as the Chairman of the 7th and 8th Central Committees of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国致公党第9、10届中央委员会主席，为印尼华侨。
description.en: Served as the Chairman of the 9th and 10th Central Committees of the China Zhi Gong Party, and was an Indonesian overseas Chinese.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国致公党第11、12届中央委员会主席，为新加坡华侨。
description.en: Served as the Chairman of the 11th and 12th Central Committees of the China Zhi Gong Party, and was a Singaporean overseas Chinese.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国致公党第13至15届中央委员会主席，并曾任中华人民共和国科学技术部部长。
description.en: Served as the Chairman of the 13th to 15th Central Committees of the China Zhi Gong Party, and also served as the Minister of Science and Technology of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，对包括致公党在内的民主党派进行政治领导。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China, which provides political leadership to the democratic parties, including the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党倡导并领导的政治联盟，中国致公党于1947年决议参加。
description.en: A political alliance initiated and led by the Communist Party of China, which the China Zhi Gong Party resolved to join in 1947.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式，中国致公党派代表参加了其第一届全体会议。
description.en: The organizational form of the Chinese People's Patriotic United Front. Representatives of the China Zhi Gong Party attended its first plenary session.

description.zh-cn: 1957年发起的政治运动，期间中国致公党及其部分领导人遭到打击。
description.en: A political campaign launched in 1957, during which the China Zhi Gong Party and some of its leaders were targeted.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一场政治运动，期间中国致公党等民主党派的活动被禁止。
description.en: A political movement in China, during which the activities of democratic parties like the China Zhi Gong Party were banned.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，1978年决定恢复致公党等民主党派的活动。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who decided to restore the activities of the democratic parties, including the China Zhi Gong Party, in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 一场军事行动，期间陈炯明的军队被击败，导致中国致公党总部迁至香港。
description.en: A military campaign during which Chen Jiongming's army was defeated, leading to the relocation of the China Zhi Gong Party headquarters to Hong Kong.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国科学技术部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国科学技术部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代革命家，曾在海外檀香山担任洪门总会掌管刑罚的洪棍。
description.en: A modern Chinese revolutionary who served as a "Hung Kwun" (enforcer) for the Hongmen general society in Honolulu.

description.zh-cn: 一个历史悠久的民间社团，与中国致公党的源流有关。
description.en: A historical fraternal organization with ties to the origins of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，年轻时曾加入哥老会，并得到袍哥会协助。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China who joined the Gelaohui in his youth and was assisted by the Paoge Hui.

description.zh-cn: 中国清代的民间秘密社团。
description.en: A secret society in China during the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国西南地区的民间秘密社团。
description.en: A secret society in southwestern China.

nodes.id: 中国国民党革命委员会

zh-cn: 中国国民党革命委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the democratic parties of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国致公党中央副主席，四川省副省长。
description.en: Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party and Vice Governor of Sichuan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Sichuan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任天津市副市长，致公党党员。
description.en: Former Vice Mayor of Tianjin and a member of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国天津市的直辖市国家行政机关。
description.en: The municipal state administrative organ of Tianjin, a direct-controlled municipality of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国致公党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国致公党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国致公党的最高执行机关。
description.en: The highest executive body of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国致公党代表，参加了中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议。
description.en: A representative of the China Zhi Gong Party who attended the first plenary session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国致公党代表，参加了中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议。
description.en: A representative of the China Zhi Gong Party who attended the first plenary session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国致公党代表，参加了中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议。
description.en: A representative of the China Zhi Gong Party who attended the first plenary session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国致公党代表，参加了中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议。
description.en: A representative of the China Zhi Gong Party who attended the first plenary session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国致公党的成立地点。
description.en: The founding location of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 陈炯明是中国致公党的创始人之一，并被推举为首任总理。
description.en: Chen Jiongming was one of the founders of the China Zhi Gong Party and was elected as its first Premier.

description.zh-cn: 唐继尧是中国致公党的创始人之一，并被推举为副总理。
description.en: Tang Jiyao was one of the founders of the China Zhi Gong Party and was elected as its Vice Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中国致公党的前身是由华侨社团“美洲洪门致公堂”发起的组织。
description.en: The predecessor of the China Zhi Gong Party was an organization initiated by the overseas Chinese society "Hongmen Chee Kung Tong in the Americas".

relationships.source: 中国致公党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央委员会是中国致公党的最高执行机关。
description.en: The Central Committee is the highest executive body of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国致公党是接受中国共产党政治领导的参政党。
description.en: The China Zhi Gong Party is a participating party that accepts the political leadership of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1947年5月，致公党决议参加中国共产党倡导并领导的人民民主统一战线。
description.en: In May 1947, the Zhi Gong Party resolved to join the People's Democratic United Front initiated and led by the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 作为致公党代表参加了中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议。
description.en: As a representative of the Zhi Gong Party, attended the first plenary session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 作为致公党代表参加了中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议。
description.en: As a representative of the Zhi Gong Party, attended the first plenary session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 作为致公党代表参加了中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议。
description.en: As a representative of the Zhi Gong Party, attended the first plenary session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 作为致公党代表参加了中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议。
description.en: As a representative of the Zhi Gong Party, attended the first plenary session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 作为致公党代表参加了中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议。
description.en: As a representative of the Zhi Gong Party, attended the first plenary session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 作为致公党代表参加了中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议。
description.en: As a representative of the Zhi Gong Party, attended the first plenary session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在国民革命军东征时，陈炯明军队被击败。
description.en: During the Eastern Expedition of the National Revolutionary Army, Chen Jiongming's army was defeated.

description.zh-cn: 反右运动期间，致公党遭到中共打击。
description.en: During the Anti-Rightist Campaign, the Zhi Gong Party was targeted by the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 在反右运动期间，陈其尤被划为右派分子。
description.en: During the Anti-Rightist Campaign, Chen Qiyou was labeled a rightist.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，致公党与其他民主党派一同被查禁。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the Zhi Gong Party, along with other democratic parties, was banned.

description.zh-cn: 陈其尤在文化大革命期间遭迫害而死。
description.en: Chen Qiyou was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1978年，经邓小平决定，中国致公党恢复活动。
description.en: In 1978, by the decision of Deng Xiaoping, the China Zhi Gong Party resumed its activities.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国科学技术部

description.zh-cn: 孙中山在海外檀香山担任洪门总会掌管刑罚的洪棍。
description.en: Sun Yat-sen served as a "Hung Kwun" (enforcer) for the Hongmen general society in Honolulu.

description.zh-cn: 朱德年轻时曾经加入哥老会。
description.en: Zhu De joined the Gelaohui in his youth.

description.zh-cn: 袍哥会曾协助朱德起兵。
description.en: The Paoge Hui assisted Zhu De in his uprising.

relationships.target: 中国国民党革命委员会

description.zh-cn: 李济深参与了中国国民党革命委员会的组建工作。
description.en: Li Jishen participated in the formation of the Revolutionary Committee of the Chinese Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 曹小红曾任天津市副市长。
description.en: Cao Xiaohong formerly served as Vice Mayor of Tianjin.
